question: You are looking for a part-time job. Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letter:introduce yourselfexplain what sort of job you would likesay what experience and skills you haveBegin your letter as follows: Dear Sir / Madam
text: As a college student studying at London University, I am writing this letter in the hope of getting a part-time job in west London, where my school locates.

I would like to work as a web developer or UI designer, in which position I can make the best of what I learn for my major, computer science. Although the company's size does not matter to me, I want to work on a project relevant to people's daily lives and probably can make the world a better place.

As per experience, I can use code with Java and C language and build front-end apps on React framework without any problems. Additionally, I can manage databases, which are critical for any kind of web application. I also have one-year part-time job experience in mobile app development.
Please contact me if you have anything suitable for me.
